BH/Blastrage




The skimmer stopped, facing the Ark, from about fifty feet away.


"Ready, Blastrage?"

"Yes."

"Fire when ready."

"Understood." Blastrage flipped a swithc on the large grenade 
launcher mounted onto the skimmer.  He fired off three grenades at 
the Ark, each set to explode on impact.
